name: @whenmoon-afk/snapshot-mcp-server
description: MCP server for managing conversation snapshots - one command setup

scripts.package:win: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --compress GZip --output releases/snapshot-mcp-installer-windows.exe
scripts.package:mac: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-macos-x64,node18-macos-arm64 --compress GZip --output releases/snapshot-mcp-installer-macos
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --compress GZip --output releases/snapshot-mcp-installer-linux
scripts.package:all: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64,node18-macos-x64,node18-macos-arm64,node18-linux-x64 --compress GZip --out-path releases

author: WhenMoon-afk
